DOC.brief_summary: Assess efficacy WelChol® plus Zetia® treat patient high cholesterol
DOC.brief_title: Effect Combination Therapy With Two Drugs ( Colesevelam Ezetimibe ) Patients With High Cholesterol
DOC.criteria: 1880 year age , inclusive ; A history primary hypercholesterolemia Any serious disorder include pulmonary , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal ( include clinically significant malabsorption ) , uncontrolled endocrine/ metabolic , hematologic/oncologic ( within last 5 year ) , neurologic psychiatric disease would interfere conduct study interpretation data ; Hepatic dysfunction include biliary cirrhosis , unexplained persistent liver function abnormality , preexist gallbladder disease
